user.no_authorization: You are not authorized to do this operation.
user.no_token: You are not logged in or your token has expired. Please log in again.
user.not_found: There was a problem while enquiring the user database. Please retry.
user.update_failed: Error in the database while updating the user. Please try again.
user.no_user_client: There was a problem while enquiring the database. The user or client does not exist. Please try again.
user.check_failed: Error in the database while checking the user. Please try again.
user.registration_failed: Error in the database while registering the user. Please try again.
user.token_gen_failed: Server error while generating a token or the server is offline. Please try again.
user.pass_email_validation: The password or e-mail fail the validation requirements:
user.pass_check_failed: Error while checking the password in the database (encryption error). Please try again.
user.email_exists: This e-mail is already registered. Please log in.
user.pass_generate_fail: Could not generate a secured password (encryption error). Please retry.
user.reset_link_failed: Server error while generating a reset link or the server is offline. Please try again.
user.reset_link_expired: The validity of the reset link has expired.

orders.not_found: There was a problem while enquiring the database. Please try again.
orders.save_failed: There was a problem while saving the order in the database. Please try again.
orders.complete_failed: There was a problem while completing the order in the database. Please try again.
orders.modify_failed: There was a problem while editing the order in the database. Please try again.
orders.delete_failed: There was a problem while deleting the order in the database. Please try again.

clients.not_found: There was a problem while enquiring the database. Please try again.
clients.save_failed: There was a problem while saving the client. Please try again.
clients.no_delete: The client has pending or uninvoiced orders. Please complete or remove client's orders before attempting to remove it.
clients.modify_failed: There was a problem while editing the client. Please reload the page.
clients.delete_failed: There was a problem while removing the client. Please reload the page.

invoicing.not_found: There was a problem while enquiring the database. Please try again.
invoicing.issue_fail: Could not generate the invoice. Please try again
invoicing.send_failed: There was a problem while sending the message. Please try again.
invoicing.update_failed: The invoice could not be updated. Please try again.
invoicing.cannot_delete_cashed: Server error: the invoice is cashed.
invoicing.cancel_failed: There was a problem while cancelling the invoice. Please try again.
invoicing.save_failed: There was a problem while saving the invoice. Please try again.
invoicing.reversed_failed: There was a problem while reversing the invoice. Please try again.

notes.not_found: There was a problem while enquiring the database. Please try again.
notes.save_failed: There was a problem while saving the notes. Please try again.
notes.delete_failed: There was a problem while removing the notes. Please try again.

user.updated: The user has been successfully updated!
user.reset_link_sent: Please check your e-mail for the reset link.
user.pass_changed: The password has been successfully changed!

invoicing.issued: The invoice has been successfully issued!
invoicing.sent: Invoice successfully sent. You will get a copy of the message on your e-mail.
invoicing.saved: The invoice has been successfully cashed!
invoicing.reversed: The invoice has been successfully reversed!

PDF.gen_failed: There was a problem while generating the PDF file. Please try again.

database.connection_failed: There was a problem while accessing the database. Please try again.
